alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:48PM EDT until July 20 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GEAUGA...NORTHEASTERN LAKE AND WEST CENTRAL ASHTABULA COUNTIES... At 647 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Madison, or 9 miles east of Painesville, moving southeast at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR eastern Lake, northeast Geauga, and western Ashtabula Counties. HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. Locations impacted include... Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, Madison, Perry, North Perry, Thompson and North Madison. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION. This storm is producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
